name: BEWREMABI dataset: Belgian Shipwreck - hotspots for Marine Biodiversity: Macrofauna in vicinity of shipwrecks
description: Data was gathered during BEWREMABIproject (part of SPSD-II federal science policy programme)sampling campaigns. Macrofauna was sampled in the vicinity of shipwrecks using macrofauna core + scuba.
